name: Hiding in plain Sight
description:
A stealth game where you go from point A to Point B, handing over precious Cargo... But, you cannot sneak, you cannot avoid guards. You have to encounter a guard who will check your inventory, to get to the end.
Controls are WS to move forward back, AD to turn left and right.
Escape to Pause.

And Click the tab to the right to open the Inventory.
And click on your Inventory Slots to swap them over

White = Empty.

Red = Illegal (What you're trying to smuggle)

Green =  Personal. 

Grey = Junk.
